events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it and get a full refund because the product is not what I expected.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund based on their request to return the item and receive their money back.
This case has been assigned to Agent Sarah, who handles refund and return inquiries for faster resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order and get a refund. I'll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product doesn't fit my needs and I'd prefer to return it for a refund.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return label via email within the hour. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick assistance and look forward to getting the return label soon.
We have sent the return shipping label to your email. Please use it to send the product back, and we will issue your refund promptly.
We wanted to check if you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the product back. Thanks for following up!
Your returned product has been received and the refund has been processed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
We are closing your case now. Please contact us if you need any further help in the future.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback about your refund experience with our service today.
